backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing debate management, agent registry with 9 pre-populated agents, user profiles, file metadata storage, and access control with admin/user permissions using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted documentation of frontend component summaries describing authentication flows, debate state management, speech recognition/synthesis, file upload chunking, and agent registry UI with tactical dark aesthetic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based neutral grayscale color palette defining CSS custom properties for light and dark modes with sidebar, chart, and UI component theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for 'The Gang' application with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with three tabs (boardroom, sensory, health), Internet Identity authentication, debate state management with strict four-state rendering, push-to-talk transcript handling with try/catch/finally error handling, and backend actor initialization guards.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table component displaying agents from backend with real-time status indicators (green/red), kill switch toggles using shadcn Switch, tactical dark aesthetic with sharp borders, and backend actor initialization guard clauses.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Debate transcript display component parsing multi-line speaker messages (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM, User) with color-coded cards, emergency mode badge, and text-to-speech button for Robby's responses.
Interrupt button component that cancels active speech synthesis and calls backend abortDebate mutation to stop ongoing debates.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: React component that provides a push-to-talk button using speech recognition, with visual feedback during listening and automatic transcript completion callback when recording stops.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: File upload component supporting drag-and-drop, camera capture, and chunked uploads (1.8MB chunks) with file preview extraction for text/image files and routing to backend agents.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication using @dfinity/auth-client, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including debate status polling, starting/aborting debates, document routing, and agent status management with automatic cache invalidation.
React hook wrapping the Web Speech Recognition API for voice input, managing listening state, transcript capture, and error handling with automatic cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook for text-to-speech using Web Speech Synthesis API with voice selection support, prioritizing British male voices, and managing speaking state.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub for future wake word detection integration using @picovoice/porcupine-react library.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up the root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by stripping HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown-style links into clickable anchor elements with styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Comprehensive URL parameter management utilities supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH color variables, extended theme tokens for UI components (sidebar, chart, card, etc.), custom animations, and typography/container plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing The Gang multi-agent system architecture with 8 AI agent canisters plus 1 ingestion canister on Internet Computer, including sovereignty constraints, storage limits, known IC0536 error, and implemented features for dashboard, polling, and speech interaction.
